EmailTemplate.name: CHANGES- Inform customer request received - For leads (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Customer Privacy request - Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer, We have received your request for changes to the personal information that DuPont has concerning you.
Be advised that we will begin processing your request shortly. For further queries and assistance, please contact us using the details provided below.
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA
Phone number: 0080038766838 Fax number: 34 912 72 52 37
